description: TextMate is a free text editor used to edit source code, write screenplays, run SQL queries, create blog entries, and more. The software was originally available for purchase but MacroMates made its source code available to developers in version 2 to allow them to modify the editor.

Before version 2 was released, TextMate supported TMPROJ files, which are used to organize source code files together in one project. However, support for TMPROJ files ended when TextMate 2 was released.
